experience.title: Lead Software Engineer
experience.description: Partner in a design and development agency working for companies going from startups to Fortune 500 companies. Projects range from proof-of-concepts to production applications.

value.label: Hightail
value.description: Built an Angular analytics dashboard for Hightail Space with charts to show health and activity of a workspace.

value.label: witwik
value.description: Created an React Native mobile app to share locations with co-workers backed with Django backend and Express.js microservices for photo uploads and push notifications.

value.label: Color Picker
value.description: Physical color picker built with Tornado for realtime and hosted on a Raspberry Pi.

value.label: VMware
value.description: Integrated to Workspace One team to work on the Angular frontend on the application grid view and make it mobile friendly.

value.label: CA Tech
value.description: Built a React metric palette relying on Material UI to aggregate data from different CA Tech projects under one umbrella. The project was also designed as a library so the different projects would be able to integrate metrics into their own dashboard.

value.label: GuestViewGuide by NEC
value.description: Prototyped an interactive frame for vacation rentals guests with a Raspberry Pi and a touch screen. And in charge of developing the production React web application and Express.js/React dashboard for property managers to customize the guest experience.

value.label: Minerva Project
value.description: Created a standalone project to build a collaborative question/answers iframe-able application for students. Collaboration relied on ShareDB, React and Quill.js. I worked closely with their team to make sure the project will be extendable (they added jupyter integration later on) and maintenable (we agreed on database and API structure).

value.label: CRE Simple
value.description: Put in charge of the React application to manage document workflows for commercial real estate transactions.

value.label: Nextravel
value.description: Built the frontend for the flight search with Typescript.

value.label: Rising Team
value.description: Created a React web application to include a flexible workflow mechanism to have ICs and managers take surveys, and aggregate results for the managers backed by a Django backend. It also featured a 1:1 tool and a complex e-mail notification tool.

value.label: Winnebago
value.description: Created a proof-of-concept iOS app for Electric van built with React Native. The app displays data streamed from the vehicle and integrate with Azure services to retrieve map, direction and charging station locations.

value.label: Headroom
value.description: Put in charge of the frontend React application to work along their team to add Low Bandwidth HD and Virtual Backgrounds and improved stability and UI quality.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Joined early-stage startup to build an omni-channel loyalty and engagement platform.

value.description: Designed APIs to manage loyalty program mechanisms (leaderboard, points, rewards)
Created a third-party Javascript library for cross domain iframe communications that have been installed on over 10K websites with a reach of 25M users
Developed an efficient system to capture, store and manipulate third party user data (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Shopify)
Engineered a Content Management System to create promotional campaigns handling configuration and design customizations
Built internal developer tools: custom front-end framework, deployment bot
